Edge Case Markup

Post: Modified Date

07 Jan 2010 • Post Formats

This post has been updated and should show a modified date if last_modified_at is used in the layout.

Plugins like jekyll-sitemap use this field to add a <lastmod> tag your sitemap.xml.

 Post Formats  readability  standard
